title: Elaine Treharne is Professor of Medieval Literature in the Department of English at the University of Leicester. She is the author of numerous books and articles on Old English literature, including Old and Middle English: An Anthology
She is Chair of the English Association and Second Vice-President of the International Society of Anglo-Saxonists
